description: Formal Tender/SOA/RFQ for Multifood Orders for the Defence Department
full_summary:
### Solicitation Title
W0127-22P028 - Multiple Food Categories - Edmonton Garrison

### Solicitation Summary

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking bids for Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISOs) for the supply and delivery of miscellaneous groceries to Edmonton Garrison in Alberta. The RISOs will be valid for the period of the standing offer contract.

### Key Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4294636301-Doc4314518576
* **Publication Date**: February 2, 2024
* **Closing Date and Time**: April 5, 2024, 14:00:00 HAE (Hours After Eastern)
* **Location of Delivery**: Edmonton Garrison, Alberta
* **Contract Period**: From April 1, 2024, to August 31, 2024
* **Method of Selection**: Competitive – Lowest Priced
* **Amendment Status**: Amendment 1, published on March 18, 2024

### Solicitation Requirements

The PWGSC, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, requires the following:

* Supply and delivery of miscellaneous groceries (including meat products, dairy products, prepared and preserved foods, fresh fruits, and fresh vegetables) on an as-needed basis
* THE supplier will be required to deliver the products to Edmonton Garrison

### Trade Agreements

* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

### Bidding Instructions

Only bid suppliers must register on Ariba Discovery ([https://discovery.ariba.com](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18691222?extsite=MTg2OTEyMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)) by the closing date and time.

A qualified and complete bid must be submitted according to the bid requirements outlined in the solicitation document.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:
Rina Marsland
SPAC/PSPC
(rina.marsland@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
